xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Natthi-vigataduka
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Natthi-vigataduka
81.
349Natthipaccayā…pe…  vigatapaccayā nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi.
350(Yathā ārammaṇamūlakaṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
<< Catukkaup Avigataduka >>
